name: Thief Birds - Controls Demo
description:
Thief Birds is a game where you play as a bird to steal the belongings of people in cities to upgrade your bird. 

This game is a demo of a bird controller that I created. In the demo, you will have to complete two small challenges to test out the controller. I would really appreciate it if you would give feedback on how the controller feels and what aspects of it should be improved/changed. Pooping will be added soon!😄

Join the game's Discord to follow its development and share your ideas!

If you'd like, follow the game's Twitter and Reddit:
